casebody.data:
Albert H. SAUER, Jr., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. David COWEN, Doing Business as Cowen Brothers, Defendant-Appellee. No. 110. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 5, 1938. Harry B. Rook, of Newark, N. J. (Joseph A. Rave, of Cincinnati, Ohio, of counsel), for appellant. James & Franklin, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decision affirmed.
